oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A new map of the East India Isles: from the latest authorities
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cary, John , approximately 1754-1835
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Relief shown pictorially and with shading.
Covers Sumatra, Java, Borneo, Sulawesi, the Philippines, Papua new Guinea and portions of China, Burma and Malaysia.
Shows boundaries, rivers, roads and settlements.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale [ca. 1:9,000,000](E 95째--E 135째/N 20째--S 10째).
